channel.title: Forbes Real Time
channel.description: Forbes Real Time news stream features up-to-date activity throughout Forbes.com. Watch news stories, photo galleries and video content publish in real time.

item.title: In Donald Trump Vs. Elizabeth Warren, Its Advantage Warren
item.description: The media love seeing two charismatic politicians going at it hammer-and-tongs. But it would be a mistake to view this as a mere personality duel. These exchanges reveal some things about the emerging dynamic of the race – things not good for Trump. This is another iteration of the asymmetrical [...]
item.creator: John McQuaid, Contributor

item.title: NBA To LeBron James: Here Are 3,300,000 Reasons To Leave Cleveland Right Now
item.description: LeBron James's return to Cleveland and the team's roller coaster playoff run constituted one of the best storylines in recent NBA history. Why, then, is the league offering James a huge incentive to leave the Cavaliers as a free agent this summer? Because of a salary cap structure that's so complex [...]
item.creator: Allen St. John, Contributor

item.title: Are Financial Markets Over-Exaggerating The Brexit Effect?
item.description: We’ve talked about the Brexit effect the past couple of days and we’ll continue on that theme today, as people continue to digest the results and come to grips with potential outcomes. The knee-jerk reaction in markets has suggested that there is considerable fear of another global financial crisis. But as [...]
item.creator: Bryan Rich, Contributor

item.title: Philippine President-Elect To Use Less Profanity After Taking Office
item.description: Philippine President-elect Rodrigo Duterte used the F-word in a speech earlier this month when tellingjournalists what not do with him. In the same 20-minute address, the man known as a crime-busting mayor of the country’s second largest city likened the odds of his apologizing to a journalist to the excrement [...]
item.creator: Ralph Jennings, Contributor

item.title: Does Brexit Herald A New Era For Big Data-Driven Forecasting?
item.description: How traditional polling, prediction markets and superforecasters all failed to robustly predict Brexit and how new data like search trends might offer insights in the future
item.creator: Kalev Leetaru, Contributor
